name: (07/12) Dragonfly
description:
Bug-themed side-scrolling shoot and loot action, with bug-themed ship customization.

Soundtrack

"Sky Bandit," "Victory," "Defeat," and "Bridge to Your Heart" by Vav.

Month 7 of 12

  • Idea
  • Retrospective

Controls

  • Move: WASD or directional arrow keys
  • Shoot Primary: Z or Mouse 1
  • Shoot Secondary: X or Mouse 2
  • Drop Bomb: C or Mouse 3
  • Move Fast: Hold Shift
  • Move Slow: Hold Space
